Like Chardonnay, the Sau- vignon Blanc grape is con- sidered a noble variety capable of producing top- flight white wines— particularly in such regions as the Loire Valley, Bordeaux, California and Australia. In California this grape variety also appears under the name of Fume Blanc, and you will find the finest examples of this varietal—called Sauvignon or Fume Blanc—listed below.
